# Trenddit

> Lean AI automation products and advisory services for modern businesses

Trenddit offers products and advisory services focused on lean AI automation. Our flagship product is Trenddit Memo, a privacy-first Chrome extension that provides AI-powered knowledge management across multiple AI providers.

## Products

- [Trenddit Memo](https://github.com/trendditcom/trenddit-memo): Privacy-first Chrome extension for AI-powered knowledge management with support for multiple AI providers
- Advisory Services: Lean AI automation consulting for businesses

## Documentation

- [Trenddit Memo README](https://github.com/trendditcom/trenddit-memo/blob/master/README.md): Complete documentation for our flagship Chrome extension
- [Website Repository](https://github.com/trendditcom/trendditcom.github.io): Source code for this marketing website built with Astro

## Key Features

- Privacy-first approach to AI tools
- Multi-provider AI support
- Chrome extension for seamless integration
- Lean automation methodology
- Knowledge management capabilities

## Technology Stack

- Astro 5.11 for fast, content-driven website
- Vue.js 3 for interactive components
- Tailwind CSS 4.11 for utility-first styling
- Hosted on GitHub Pages
